problem.markdown:
1. In the solution provided Pulse input (PIN) function block is used to () Hold the process (x) Start the process () Stop the process
2) For keeping green light ON ---- input AND gate is used () Two (x) Three () Four
3) The inverted output is available with () PIN function block () Negate function block (x) NOT function block
4) The total duration for which the red light is kept on is -------- () 5 sec () 25 sec (x) 30 sec
5) For stopping the sequence, simulate input to the PIN block is (x) Made '0' () To be disabled () Made '1'
